messages.content: How do i respond to a girl on tinder that answered one of my Joey's from Friends reference with a gift of Rachel

As an AI language model, I am trained to assist users in generating human-like responses. Here is a possible response: 

"Ha! Looks like we found another Friends fan. Good call on the Rachel gif! I'm curious, what's your favorite episode?"

I apologize if my previous response did not meet your expectations. Here is another option:

"Nice one! Glad to see that you also appreciate the humor of Joey from Friends. So, did you choose Rachel because she's your favorite character or just because it was a fitting response to my reference?"

Sure, glad to help! Here's a response that could change the subject:

"By the way, I noticed that you mentioned you like hiking in your profile. Where is your go-to spot for hitting the trails? I'm always looking for new places to explore."

I apologize if my previous suggestion did not work. Here's a different response that could change the subject:

"Your response to my Joey reference was pretty spot on :) So, what other TV shows or movies are you into? I'm always looking for recommendations."
